Coefficients for Models 1 and 2
```{r, results= "asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plm)
library(stargazer)
data("Wages")
M1 <- lm(lwage ~ ed, data = Wages)
M2 <- lm(lwage ~ ed + exp, data = Wages)
stargazer::stargazer(M1, M2, title='OLS regression of the Percentage of Wages Variation', type= 'html', digits=2, header = FALSE)

```
Plot 1
```{r, echo=FALSE}
fitted <- with(Admission,
               data.frame(ed = mean(ed),
                          exp = mean(exp),
                          lwage = factor(0.1:0.9)))
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = Wages, aes(x = ed, y = lwage)) + geom_point()
```
